name: Moonlight Sonata (Hareland Studios)
description:
Moonlight is a game made by Hotpaw at Hareland studios! 

It was a challenge to make a game in 3 hours with random words as themes!

the words where: Sword, Bounce, Lyric, Moon!

The game is about calming down the moon by hiting the right notes!

CONTROLS:

Mouse to choose poem

A - D : To rotate sword.
